definition-item.definition-title: VEHICLE CONNECTIONS (components of brake systems B60T17/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Types of hitches/devices which are not covered by this subclass include:

list-item.paragraph-text: Carriers for bikes or other load which are connected to hitches.
Hitches which are used not between vehicles e.g. Between bikes.
Electrical / hydraulic / pneumatic connections as long as the hitch / part of the hitch is concerned, as e.g. Fixation to the hitch, sensor on the hitch, etc.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Agricultural machines like tractors, plows, etc.
Lighting, signalling;
Vehicles, vehicle fittings or vehicle parts not otherwise provided for;
Supporting, lifting, or manoeuvring of vehicles
Brake arrangements, brake control systems or parts thereof;
Carts (with hitches)
K - motor-cycles, accessories therefor;
Testing of vehicles.

definition-item.definition-title: Traction couplings; Hitches; Draw-gear; Towing devices (devices specially adapted for connection between tractors and agricultural machines or implements A01B59/00; fifth-wheel couplings B62D)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

All kinds of couplings between vehicles, but not between bikes, motorbikes. If a connection is solely claimed for connecting multiple bikes or motorbikes or connecting trailers solely to bikes or motorbikes then the connection should indeed not be classified in B60D but in the respective classes for bikes or motorbikes like e.g. B62K27/00. For classifying such a document it should then be referred to that field only.
However, in practise most of the connections are NOT explicitly claimed for bikes or motorbikes which then makes the documents relevant to be classified in B60D.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices specially adapted for connection between tractors and agricultural machines
External carriers for bikes
Carts
Bikes or motorbikes

definition-item.definition-title: Traction couplings or hitches characterised by their type

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Traction couplings or hitches according to their type, e.g. ball-and-socket hitches, bolt-type couplings etc.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: 5th wheel couplings

definition-item.definition-title: Draw-gear or towing devices characterised by their type

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Gears according to their type, e.g. V shaped draw gears or draw gears which consist of a single longitudinal bar.

definition-item.definition-title: characterised by arrangements for particular functions

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Rather than for the features of the devices they are classified according to their function into the main or different sub-groups like remote control of release function, preventing unwanted disengagements etc.
This place covers:

Mountings or supports for hitches on the towing vehicle body. Opposite to this, class B60D1/143 concerns also features related to mounting but specifically only draw gears fixed to the towed vehicle. B60D1/48 is intended to further specify the kind of fixation of the vehicle hitch/draw gear to the towing vehicle body.
This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Load, weight, angle, force, torque measuring or sensing devices
Length of drawbar or position measuring devices.
Coupling monitoring systems such as alarm systems (theft prevention)
Auxilliary accessories on hitches (such as steps).

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electric or fluid circuits specially adapted for vehicles and not otherwise provided for
Vehicle brake control systems or parts thereof
Ground-engaging vehicle fittings for supporting, lifting, or manoeuvring the vehicle, wholly or in part, e.g. built-in jacks
Arrangements for measuring electric power or power factor

Radio direction-finding; radio navigation; determining distance or velocity by use of radio waves; locating or presence-detecting by use of the reflection or reradiation of radio waves; analogous arrangements using other waves
Line connectors; current collectors

definition-item.definition-title: Fittings to facilitate pushing (B60D1/00 takes precedence; vehicle bumpers B60R19/02; steering arrangements for backing a normally-drawn trailer B62D13/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Couplings for facilitating pushing

definition-item.definition-title: Gangways for coupled vehicles, e.g. of concertina type

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Bellow or concertina type gangway between coupled vehicles, such as between two wagons, as e.g. rotatable platforms.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Communication passages between coaches, e.g. platforms; Adaptation of coach ends therefor
Flexible Communication passages between coaches, e.g. bellows; Adaptation of coach ends therefor
Articulated buses with interconnecting passageway, e.g. bellows

definition-item.definition-title: Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Connections not otherwise provided for like temporary vehicle connections which can be connected or unconnected while driving.
